cgcloud__Account_Product_Profile__c.name: cgcloud__Account_Product_Profile__c
cgcloud__Account_Product_Profile__c.description: This object stores statistical profiles that indicate the distribution of weekly data between a customer and category.

cgcloud__Check_is_Product_Unique__c.description: Helper field (not in the UI): used to check that there's a maximum of one account product profile for an Account-Product2 combination.

cgcloud__Friday__c.description: Input value for the share that's valid for Fridays.

cgcloud__Monday__c.description: Input value for the share that's valid for Mondays.

cgcloud__Record_Link__c.description: Link to the detail page of the Week Day Distribution Profile.

cgcloud__Sales_Org__c.description: Sales organization to which the weekday distribution profile belongs.

cgcloud__Saturday__c.description: Input value for the share that's valid for Saturdays.

cgcloud__Sunday__c.description: Input value for the share that's valid for Sundays.

cgcloud__Thursday__c.description: Input value for the share that's valid for Thursdays.

cgcloud__Total__c.description: Sum of all the input weekday values in the current profile.

cgcloud__Tuesday__c.description: Input value for the share that's valid for Tuesdays.

cgcloud__Wednesday__c.description: Input value for the share that's valid for Wednesdays.
